text.div:
AnswerFormat

The expected format of an answer

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/answer-format

CodeDisplayDefinition
decimal Answer is a floating point number.
integer Answer is an integer.
boolean Answer is a yes/no answer.
date Answer is a date.
string Answer is a free-text entry.
dateTime Answer is a date and time.
instant Answer is a system timestamp.
single-choice Answer is a single choice from the options.
multiple-choice Answer is one or more choices from the options.
open-single-choice Answer is a single choice from the options or a free-text entry.
open-multiple-choice Answer is one or more choices from the options and/or a free-text entry.

name: AnswerFormat
description: The expected format of an answer
